column5: I gapped this today.   The north store has the Jiffy 3hp 8 inch for 289.There was 7 of them.
Jeez, that's just a wee bit more than 1/2 price, good find.
I thought you bought an auger last year
Are ya all drunk. I am saying they have.Ya I have.

Are these not the ones that CT. had at the end of the season last year that are refurbished. I believe that there were issues with the motors on them. I dont think that there is a warranty on them.Just fyi.
No refurbish. I asked.
oh, so you were just window shopping ..I see
I was looking for new boots,if ya really need to know.
see now was that so difficult to say
I may just grab one of those. Thanks for the heads up Brian.
Hey Brian, did you see any 10" Jiffys?  Thanks.
Brian, didn't you buy new boots last year?
Now that's funny I don't care who you are!
All 8 inch.    Yes Roy,just keeping up with the new fashion.
I know, Brian. Buying a centerpin will do that to guys.
Be well my friend

Just came home from the North end Canadian Tire.  They have since put a sign up saying that the augers are reconditioned.  The gentleman working in the department did not know if a warranty applied.  I am waiting for a phone call back to confirm..
I was there this morning to look for a member here and there was none???????????????????New batch??????????????

Maybe...  They were right in the centre isle, north of the fishing section.  There was about 7 boxes or so.  1 was out on display with a yellow tag on it that said who re-conditioned it.  Hope that helps..

Just a heads up, I have a special order coming in, Ofners can have first crack at them.  If you want one PM or email me phil @ etackle.ca asap.  Pay and I'll reserve you one. Coming in this week.  Jiffy 10" MODEL 30-3500 SERIES 30-10-ALL  $359.47 plus tax.  Pick up in Bowmanville Will ship as well.  Approx. $20 for Ontario.
They must have a stack of them in the back.
